import requests

url = "https://turkey-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com/il/34"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkey-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://turkey-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com/il/{il}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "turkey-postal-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
